To make this dish, preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Place pizza dough in a greased pan. Top with desired toppings. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from oven and let cool before serving.
To make this dish, preheat the oven to 425°F. Place the pizza dough on a greased baking sheet. Top with desired toppings. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.
